# moveUpAndModifySelection(_:)

**Instance Method**

Extends the selection to include the content above the current selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func moveUpAndModifySelection(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Modifying the Selection

- **moveBackwardAndModifySelection(_:)**: Extends the selection to include the content before the current selection.
- **moveDownAndModifySelection(_:)**: Extends the selection to include the content below the current selection.
- **moveForwardAndModifySelection(_:)**: Extends the selection to include the content after the current selection.
- **moveLeftAndModifySelection(_:)**: Extends the selection to include the content to the left of the current selection.
- **moveRightAndModifySelection(_:)**: Extends the selection to include the content to the right of the current selection.
